attributes.additional_details:
We the people demand that the BBC Channel 'BBC Three' be saved from its impending cessation of services.

BBC Three is a now long-standing channel catering to the adolescent and young adult audiences and License Fee payers.

BBC Three is a very important channel to young people, offering life lessons, documentaries about young life, including sexual health and the downsides of alcohol and drug abuse.

The channel also receives 1.5% of UK Television Audience share, as compared to 1.0% of BBC Four, which is to carry on its services.

We the signatories, as License Fee payers, call the DCMS to veto this decision on behalf of the people of Britain.

rejection.details: This is an operational matter for the BBC.
